projects.Description: A full stack web application that is a winterwear shopping alternative to expensive and non eco-friendly drop shipping sites. I led and fully executed all back end and front end javascript for this activity. It is built using Node, MySql, Express, Sequelize, and Passport

A command line application built using Node and the html-pdf package. Enter your GitHub username and the app will generate a PDF with your repositories and information about your profile

A command line application built using Node. The command line will prompt a user for information and once the user is done, an html page will be generated. This application also uses jest for testing and passes all tests
A command line application built using Node. The application takes two csv files as input, filters them, and outputs two newly filtered csv files

projects.projectName: Missing DNA evidence hampers wrongful conviction fight in Iowa
projects.Description: For many prisoners seeking to overturn their convictions, the right to DNA evidence testing exists in theory but not in practice. Iowa is among 13 U.S. states where no prisoner has ever successfully used DNA testing to win exoneration
A full stack application built with a team of other developers that uses AJAX and the meteostat API. I was responsible for back end development.
A full stack, single page application built using HTML, CSS, jQuery, AJAX, and the OpenWeatherMap API.

projects.projectName: Decades after alleged torture by police: Years more wait to have cases resolved
projects.Description: The number of defendants seeking review of their claims that they were tortured into confessing now numbers more than 500. Absent more resources to review the cases, It could be decades before those claims are resolved
A single page workday scheduler application that uses local storage to save and render data.
A single page workday quizs application that uses local storage to save and render data.

projects.projectName: After more than two decades, evidence mounts of innocence
projects.Description: A new eyewitness, unearthed police dispatch tapes, and allegations of misconduct by notorious police commander Glenn Evans cast doubt on a Chicago man’s conviction for a 1997 murder
A single page web application that is a secure password generator.
A portfolio built using HTML, CSS, and jQuery, with a focus on UI/UX design

blog.title: 1/26/20: Data Science Exploration Project
blog.text: One of the parts of my job as a data reporter that I love most is conducting complex data analysis on PostgreSQL databases. In order to be able to conduct this kind of analysis, I mostly learned on the job, using real time reporting questions of the data as a foundation to be able to write complex queries and produce my desired results.
blog.text2: A number of experienced and incredibly smart people helped me on the way, pushing me to take my skills to the next level. But a pertinent area I have yet to explore through my job is analysis that is more predictive and analytical in nature. I have conducted in-depth analysis of hundreds of millions of data points that come from years’ worth of data, but have yet to jump into the data science arena via this work.
blog.text3:
As a result, I have decided to undertake a side project to increase my data science chops. In order to increase accountability for myself on this project, and also coincidentally deciding to start a personal blog for my website, I decided my journey on this learning adventure would make the perfect series of first posts.
One of my biggest regrets of my undergraduate career was not taking more statistics courses (if you are still in this phase of life/ if you are in a position to be able to do so, I highly suggest you take as many statistics courses as possible!). But I am eager to learn and apply my knowledge that I have gained clarity about how interesting and applicable data science is to me.
blog.text5: 1) Take three to four weeks to study and practice using Introduction to Statistical Learning
blog.text6: 2) Join a beginner-level competition via DrivenData to apply my knowledge
blog.text7: I am sure the plan will adapt and change, so I will update these bullets as it does. Thanks for following me along this journey!
